titleStmt.title: A trimmer's confession of faith: or, The true principles of a Jack of both-sides. Tune of, VVhich no body can deny. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Kell, near West-Smithfield,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Pray lend me your ears, if you've any to spare,".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
